name: Health Screenings
description: San Francisco State University (SFSU) Nursing Program has an on-site nursing clinical, in which students perform special projects such as: - Offer group health workshops and biometric health screenings/wellness checks to the residents of Alcantara Court, Apollo Hotel, and Altamont Hotel - Nursing students creates bilingual trainings in English/Spanish and English/Cantonese. - Workshop groups has been limited to no more than 9 residents at a time.

howToGetIt: Service only available at certain buildings. Call to confirm.
